attributes.action: Take all possible measures to ease the housing market
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Suspend stamp duty on all properties of less than £500,000 value
2. Suspend the survey pack requirement and thoroughly reform it before re-introduction
3. Influence the lending policies of the banks of which the gov.is now a major shareholder to favour smaller borrrowers
